alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rogue Valley; Klamath Basin and the Fremont-Winema National Forest (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 21 at 7:37PM PDT until July 21 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG GUSTY WIND WITH LOW RH FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 280...284... 285...622 AND 624... Areas west of the Cascades are seeing humidities begin to recover above 15% for the evening, this will take longer east of the Cascades. The peak winds have also passed, although some gusty conditions could linger through the next hour or two, especially east of the Cascades where some critical fire weather conditions could linger. Overall though the fire weather conditions are easing, so will be allowing the warning to expire at the top of the hour.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rogue Valley; Klamath Basin and the Fremont-Winema National Forest
